subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: José Valentín fractured his right tibia when he fouled a Brett Tomko pitch off his shin, but Oliver Pérez pitched seven and one-third splendid innings to lead the Mets.
snippet: José Valentín fractured his right tibia when he fouled a Brett Tomko pitch off his shin, but Oliver Pérez pitched seven and one-third splendid innings to lead the Mets.
